data.text: @Tell_Truth3 We got a solution for that It called citizen news.  its could be the interim news service when the MSM ups andquits on us with @DJT1946Official is back in office. @HamEggsnSam  is this brilliant commentator that  uses 1st hand reports sent to him on twitter he could do it 4 U https://t.co/H2bqyfv7jZ
@Tell_Truth3 When When WHen WHEn WHEN.................WILL THEY FOOKING WAKE UP !

@Tell_Truth3 I'm convinced  people, might not be who we think they are anymore. I said to my Dad, "I don't no how peeps take the news seriously".He said ," I don't really pay attention"AS HE'S WATCHING THE NEWS on tv! Either brainwashed or.. not gonna say it, even tho I know I'm already nuts
@Tell_Truth3 It's very frustrating. These people will never get it.
@Tell_Truth3 Marxist propaganda has a powerful effect on Useful Idiots willing to allow others to tell them what to think, say, & do!

@Tell_Truth3 Exactly. The air is definitely heavy today with exhaustion. We all have other things we need to focus on & yet here in the trenches we are trying to counter the narrative. All that "be there for the normies, they'll need us" is falling flat w/me, we will need a break ourselves.

@Tell_Truth3 Its driving me insane seeing all the people gush over Zelensky the WEF puppet.  We have been conditioned for years that Russia and Putin is the boogie man.  Now we have the leaders of the NWO telling us we need to back Ukraine and people dont even question it?  Like WTF
@Tell_Truth3 This is the real story ⬇️ https://t.co/PQT6DzAgt2
